value.title: 'Walking the walk': C3.ai soars 19% after the AI software company reports big quarterly earning beat
value.excerpt: In a note Friday, Wedbush's Dan Ives said C3.ai is now "walking the walk" as it gains momentum in the fast-growing AI space.

value.title: Can Facebook’s AI Dream Resolve Its Revenue Nightmare?
value.excerpt: Facebook owner Meta is setting up a new “generative AI” product group as it strives to claw back revenues. Can its AI dream resolve its privacy nightmare?

value.title: How Artificial Intelligence Is Making It Easier To Scout Soccer Players Overseas
value.excerpt: In the past, the cost of overseas scouting meant Africa's best players like Yaya Touré only had a few routes to the top. Now, AI and high-resolution cameras are revolutionizing youth scouting, allowing clubs to scout players from West Africa to Iceland without leaving the office.

value.title: We are building next-gen AI to become a global powerhouse: Rajeev Chandrasekhar
value.excerpt: As the world goes gaga over AI chatbots, To make India a global powerhouse of AI which does not just stop on integrating foreign chatbots but building next-generation of AI-based innovations to empower billions of citizens.

value.title: Artificial intelligence, CRM: A ‘future-forward’ partnership
value.excerpt: AI develops within CRM, it will have a financial value attached to it, says Mark Annett, head of CRM Sales and Consulting at Camsoft Solutions.

value.title: AI Study Evaluates GPT-3 Using Cognitive Psychology
value.excerpt: A new study published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America (PNAS) by researchers affiliated with the Max Planck Institute for Biological Cybernetics analyzes the general intelligence of large language model (LLM) GPT-3 using cognitive psychology.

value.title: Ford Launches New Company To Focus On Driver Assist, Latitude AI
value.excerpt: After announcing the shutdown of Argo AI last fall, Ford hired more than 500 engineers from the automated driving company and they will now form the core of Latitude AI, a Pittsburgh based subsidiary focused on next generation driver assist systems.

value.title: Story Machine demonstrates how AI is helping game development
value.excerpt: Story Machine, a game creation engine from Robot Invader, uses AI to create art assets for games -- what's its purpose for developers?

value.title: Indent raises $8.1M funding for its AI-powered customer video review tool
value.excerpt: Indent, a South Korean video review platform, raises $8.1 million Series A to continue developing its AI-powered marketing tool.

value.title: 68% Of Americans Afraid Of Self-Driving Cars, Up From 55% In 2022

value.title: Adobe’s Scott Belsky talks generative AI — and why it’s not going to end up like web3
value.excerpt: Adobe's Scott Belsky says that generative AI is nothing like web3 hype because it helps increase efficiency and reduce work for creatives.

value.title: Stability AI, Hugging Face and Canva back new AI research nonprofit
value.excerpt: Eleuther AI, a group of AI researchers investigating language models, is forming a nonprofit foundation for AI research.

value.title: Neural chip plays Doom while only drawing one milliwatt of power
value.excerpt: In the latest entry of Doom running on weird things comes an AI machine-learning chip from Syntiant. That may not sound too exciting initially — it's just another processor. What is remarkable is the meager amount of power it took to run the game.

value.title: Brave Search launches an AI-powered summarization feature
value.excerpt: Brave Search launched a new "Summarizer" feature, which is powered by different large langue models (LLMs) than OpenAI's GPT.

value.title: Figure emerges from stealth with the first images of its humanoid robot
value.excerpt: Founded by Archer co-founder Brett Adcock, the startup is spending lot of time and money to build a general purpose bipedal humanoid robot.

value.title: AI Games and AI Film Festival will highlight how generative AI is taking root
value.excerpt: Get ready for the AI revolution. A group of companies is staging The Culture AI Games and Film Festival on May 9 in San Francisco.

value.title: How to spruce up your Facebook Messenger chats by adding a theme
value.excerpt: Facebook Messenger has a hidden gem of an option to make chatting with friends, family, and others a bit more fun.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Stresses Out Twitter CEO Elon Musk It Seems; Here’s Why
value.excerpt: Musk stated, "AI stresses me out," towards the close of a more than three-hour presentation to Tesla investors about business goals.

value.title: The next big threat to AI might already be lurking on the web
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence experts warn attacks against datasets used to train machine-learning tools are worryingly cheap and could have major consequences.
